titleStmt.title: Madrigals of 5. and 6. parts apt for the viols and voices. Made & newly published by Thomas Weelkes of the Coledge at Winchester, organist.
titleStmt.author: Weelkes, Thomas, 1575 (ca.)-1623.

titleStmt.title: Madrigals of 5. and 6. parts apt for the viols and voices. Made & newly published by Thomas Weelkes of the Coledge at Winchester, organist.
titleStmt.author: Weelkes, Thomas, 1575 (ca.)-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Este, the assigne of Thomas Morley,

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Canto."; part 2: "Alto."; part 3: "Tenore."; part 4: "Basso."; part 5: "Quinto."; part 6: "Sesto.".
Signatures: [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; A⁴ D⁴. Parts 1-5 have additional title pages, "Madrigals of 6. parts", on C2; the sesto part has this title page only.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
